official_title: A bill to amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to permit deferrals in the repayment of student loans for active duty members of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Corps.

summary.text: Amends the Higher Education Act of 1965 to permit deferrals in the repayment of student loans for active duty members of the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration Corps.
